# Main instructions

Kubernetes
Client switcher

CLI to easily switch version of kubectl.

## Features

- List all available kubectl remote versions
- List all installed kubectl versions
- Install specific kubectl version
- Switch kubectl version
- Uninstall specific kubectl version
- Use the kubectl version reference in the .kubernetes-version file
- Auto switch kubectl version when entering a directory with the .kubernetes-version file
- Auto-detect the kubernetes version from the cluster, install and use the related kubectl version
  - On current context, install and use kubectl version when running "kuve use"

## Branding

- Name: Kuve
- Description: Kubernetes Client Switcher
